title: Le Pain Quotidien
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, French, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International restaurant chain featuring fresh artisan bakery. Menu includes ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes, and a vegan menu  of platter, tartine, minestrone, and dessert. Atmosphere is peaceful.
streetAddress: Dhanraj Mahal, Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Marg, Colaba
